about_the_game:
Installation:
After purchasing, the DLC will be found in the local game folder.
It contains both language versions. Keep what you prefer!

***
This Art Book includes everything about the game and its development.
It is an A4 sized ebook (a pdf file) with over 100 pages (50 double pages), and in this art book you will find:

  • Detailed information about the characters, environments and the whole story
  • Doodles and sketches during the development
  • New illustrations
  • Comments from the developers
